name: api_physics2d_Rigidbody2D
description: Provides physics movement and other dynamics, and the ability to attach Collider2D to it.

properties.name: angularDamping
properties.description: The angular damping of the Rigidbody2D angular velocity.

properties.name: angularVelocity
properties.description: Angular velocity in degrees per second.

properties.name: attachedColliderCount
properties.description: Returns the number of Collider2D attached to this Rigidbody2D.

properties.name: bodyType
properties.description: The physical behaviour type of the Rigidbody2D.

properties.name: centerOfMass
properties.description: The center of mass of the rigidBody in local space.

properties.name: collisionDetectionMode
properties.description: The method used by the physics engine to check if two objects have collided.

properties.name: constraints
properties.description: Controls which degrees of freedom are allowed for the simulation of this Rigidbody2D.

properties.name: excludeLayers
properties.description: The additional Layers that all Collider2D attached to this Rigidbody2D should exclude when deciding if a contact with another Collider2D should happen or not.

properties.name: freezeRotation
properties.description: Controls whether physics will change the rotation of the object.

properties.name: gravityScale
properties.description: The degree to which this object is affected by gravity.

properties.name: includeLayers
properties.description: The additional Layers that all Collider2D attached to this Rigidbody2D should include when deciding if a contact with another Collider2D should happen or not.

properties.name: inertia
properties.description: The Rigidbody's resistance to changes in angular velocity (rotation).

properties.name: interpolation
properties.description: Physics interpolation used between updates.

properties.name: linearDamping
properties.description: The linear damping of the Rigidbody2D linear velocity.

properties.name: linearVelocity
properties.description: The linear velocity of the Rigidbody2D represents the rate of change over time of the Rigidbody2D position in world-units.

properties.name: linearVelocityX
properties.description: The X component of the linear velocity of the Rigidbody2D in world-units per second.

properties.name: linearVelocityY
properties.description: The Y component of the linear velocity of the Rigidbody2D in world-units per second.

properties.name: localToWorldMatrix
properties.description: The transformation matrix used to transform the Rigidbody2D to world space.

properties.name: mass
properties.description: Mass of the Rigidbody.

properties.name: position
properties.description: The position of the rigidbody.
